name: TheAtlantic
text: "To be anti-racist is to believe in the word 'now.' 'Patience' is a dirty word to those incarcerated by inequity," @DrIbram writes: https://t.co/YvDDR4Gz2k

name: TheAtlantic
text: Astronomers have captured an image of two giant planets around a sunlike star, and the view is eerily similar to our own spot in the cosmos, @marinakoren reports https://t.co/KkqdRM9XnY
